title: (x) New York Times Magazine pull-quote font - Interstate {Sebastian}
content:
This is from last Sunday’s New York Times magazine. Thanks for your help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [nyt.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195337/http:/typophile.com/files/nyt.jpg) | 18.27 KB |

 [‹ (x) Eurowood Cabinets Inc. logo - Minister {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195337/http:/typophile.com/node/20658 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Survival Systems Training logo - Univers, Tahoma {Geoff, Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195337/http:/typophile.com/node/20647 "Go to next forum topic")
author: allisondub

comments.content: Grumpy, usually when people ask for an ID they are looking for the font as well as the designer.

The sample is a little small, but this might be [Interstate Light & Bold Condensed Italic.](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195337/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/interstate/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195337im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Interstatelight_5171.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195337im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Interstatebold_5966.png)
thanks for posting a larger sample. but think i was right, although might be the Regular & Black weights. Maybe one of the infamous mystery solvers can have the final say?

I think you were right the first time. [Here are the new watermarkless samples at FontShop.](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911195337/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=4&displayfontid=FB.118529.0.0&fontRendererText=WHY+BE+COUNTRIES)
[unnecessary rude and gratuitous comment removed by moderator]
As I understand it, Fontshop supports Typophile. Stephen is a great resource around here however you look at it.

From the ID group page:

Type ID Board

Need to know what font it is? Post it here. **Sponsored by FontShop!**
So, it’s a hanging offense to point out when somebody is being tacky? It’s a fair cop, but Typophile is to blame.
Grumpy - I’m perplexed. Can you please elaborate on the “tacky”? Let’s have a fair and open discussion. No deletion.

Grumpy - Whenever I can, I link to FontShop showings as well, and so do others, as FontShop pays for this Type Identification Board. Why haven’t you ever attacked _me_ then?

By sponsoring us FontShop supports a free and extremely valuable service that reaches well beyond the typographic community, so I think it’s only fair that we return the favour in kind. Furthermore the people posting requests still have the freedom to purchase their type licenses elsewhere. It’s not like we’re pointing a gun to their heads or anything. Grow up, this is so sad.

Actually, I think any type supplier should be posting links here, regardless of monetary support or otherwise. The purpose of the forum is to provide help and options, and that’s what I try to do, regardless of my employment. FontShop links include custom sample strings without a watermark, so I hope they are of some use to the original poster.
I certainly appreciate your contributions. Between you, Mike, Patty, and the others, this is the most effective Type ID forum I’ve ever seen. You guys rock!
I agree with fontplayer. Thanks for the Interstate ID all!
